channel.title: Need Projectile Help

item.title: Need Projectile Help
item.dc:creator: @zamorakpkscape zamorakpkscape
item.description:
@zamorakpkscape wrote:

Hey guys… i have a couple problems with projectiles. I’m not exactly sure how to change the gfx of a projectile (ex: my range projectile is automatically a rune arrow) how do i change it to lets say… an onyx bolt (e)? also i have a problem with ammo… right now i can only use rune arrows (i know how to change) but how do i make it rune arrows OR onyx bolts [code]public void CheckArrows()
{
for(int k = 880; k < 13819; k++){

if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == k){
HasArrows = true;
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214){
HasArrows = true;
}
else {
HasArrows = false;[/code]
Right now its set for onyx bolts (e)
If you can help, please do…

Peace,
Zamorak
